title: Poppy feedback
body:
This is all obviously imo, no offense is meant and I really didn't know which board this should go in so sorry, Played without runes and masteries.

Her Q, the dmg is really low especially considering it's extremely short range, I would like to see the numbers reinforced or its range doubled, her ult is just terrible, the dmg doesn't feel anywhere near high enough for the long windup and terrible utility, smacking heroes back toward their nexus sounds alot better on paper than actually in the game, too many times its saving enemy champions or they just pop right back into the fight a few secs later.

The big thing in teamfights is she is essentially a 1 button champ but that one button doesn't impact the fight often at all and certainly not enough

replies.body: how are you using her abilities? if you join a teamfight u can get rid of their front line immediately with ur ult and then just charge at the backline. have you built any slows on ur build? having a slow makes hitting the 2nd proc of q a lot easier, obviously landing ur e does too. w is pretty strong in teamfights too as you just stop their backline from being able to escape and stopping their front line from re-engaging... but i do agree the ult dmg feels really weak. maybe they could make it do true dmg if fully charged?
